project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Create a variable to store questions and answers
Implement the game logic to ask questions and gather user input
Implement score tracking to keep track of the user's correct answers
Implement a feature to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz game features, especially the scoring logic
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
